title: A Long walk home
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Jill Robb and Brian Bosisto
brief_description: The Flinders Ranges in South Australia are a remarkable chain of ranges and valleys penetrating the arid centre of Australia. The purity of its sunlight and colours is revealed in this study of the ranges and gorges and the flora and fauna of this ancient and fascinating region.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation, Jill Robb and Brian Bosisto
description: The Flinders Ranges in South Australia are a remarkable chain of ranges and valleys penetrating the arid centre of Australia. The purity of its sunlight and colours is revealed in this study of the ranges and gorges and the flora and fauna of this ancient and fascinating region.

The purity of its sunlight and colours is revealed in this study of the ranges and gorges and the flora and fauna of this ancient and fascinating region.
